title: Ueno-san wa Bukiyou (Dub)
alternative_title: How clumsy you are, Miss Ueno., 上野さんは不器用
description: Ueno-san, who is in her third year of junior high school, is in love with the concept of falling in love. She makes full use of her inventions and tries to show it off to Tanaka, her Science Club kouhai.
